sub_title: Field Service Manager Onshore East at CRC-EVANS ONSHORE EAST
summary:
Twenty years of experience as electronic engineer and supervisor on high standard oil and gas offshore pipeline vessels. Have experience as team leader with fast problem solving abilities, troubleshooting, analytical skills and ability to work independently.
Participated during design, commission and maintenance of various industrial automated plants.
Knowledge in automation, robotics, PLC’s, frequency converters, power distribution, security systems, communication, el. motors, measuring equipment and sensors etc.
Specialized in robotics automated welding systems (Vermaat, CRC), develop robotics programs and system maintenance. Knowledge in maintenance and repair of various welding machines such as Miller, Fronius, Lincoln, manual welding equipment, pipe facing machines, internal camera and laser clamps, induction heaters, line up tables etc.

Other areas of experience:
-	gas and oil pipeline vessel systems (s-lay,j-lay and double joint)
-	dynamic position systems (DP) and control
-	power management systems, generators, transformers and el. motors
-	generators overspeed protection, starting and control system
-	frequency converters, motor starters 
-	High, medium and low voltage distribution systems (10kV-440V-220/110V)
-	marine communication, radars and nautical navigation systems
-	fire fighting and alarm centrals, elevators
-	electrically powered cranes (Liebherr, Huisman ...) and overhead cranes
-	software ( Visual C#,SQL database, Visual Basic, Microsoft Access and Excel, programmable controllers PLC’s,  Microchip microcontrollers programing in C and assembly, interfacing microcontrollers with PC and databases...)
-	analog and digital signal processing, sensors, encoders, measuring equipment
-	PCB design and development
-	reading and editing electrical, mechanical and layout drawings
-	wide knowledge in industrial electronics, automation, process controls and equipement calibrations
-	robotic experience, programming, troubleshooting and repairing
